Sentencas: In the drive to achieve economically viable solid oxide fuel cells, efforts have been directed towards substantially decreasing their operating temperature.
Titulo: Highly enhanced electrochemical performance of silicon-free platinum-yttria stabilized zirconia interfaces

Sentencas: Unfortunately, these efforts have been hindered by extremely sluggish electrode kinetics at reduced temperatures.
Titulo: Highly enhanced electrochemical performance of silicon-free platinum-yttria stabilized zirconia interfaces

Sentencas: In this report, we show that silicon impurities on the surface of the electrolyte play a critical role in influencing electrode kinetics.
Titulo: Highly enhanced electrochemical performance of silicon-free platinum-yttria stabilized zirconia interfaces

Sentencas: More specifically, improvements by as much as three orders of magnitude are reported for the performance of platinum electrodes on yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolytes prepared as high purity thin films with a largely Si-free surface.
Titulo: Highly enhanced electrochemical performance of silicon-free platinum-yttria stabilized zirconia interfaces

Sentencas: These improvements in performance are estimated to enable operation of a solid oxide fuel cell down to approximately 400 A degrees C.
Titulo: Highly enhanced electrochemical performance of silicon-free platinum-yttria stabilized zirconia interfaces
